text: yathAq vai ma#nuShyA# EqvaM dEqvA agra# Asaqn tE#&kAmayaqntAva#rtiM pAqpmAna#M mRuqtyuma#paqhatyaq daivI(gm)# saq(gm)qsada#M gacCEqmEtiq ta EqtaM ca#turvi(gm)SatirAqtra-ma#paSyaqn tamA&ha#raqn tEnA#yajantaq tatOq vai tE&va#rtiM pAqpmAna#M mRuqtyuma#paqhatyaq daivI(gm)# saq(gm)qsada#magacCaqnaq. ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa#-Scaturvi(gm)SatirAqtra-mAsaqtE&va#rtimEqva pAqpmAna#-mapaqhatyaq Sriya#M gacCantiq SrIr.hi ma#nuqShya#syaq - [  ] 4
